awards.text: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 31 nominations.

fullplot: When a single mother and her six-year-old daughter move to rural France and open a chocolate shop - with Sunday hours - across the street from the local church, they are met with some skepticism. But as soon as they coax the townspeople into enjoying their delicious products, they are warmly welcomed.
plot: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.
title: Chocolat

tomatoes.consensus: Chocolat is a charmingly light-hearted fable with a lovely performance by Binoche.
